channel.title: R on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in R on erg home

item.title: Workforce Engagement
item.description: Creating an engaged workforce We apply behavioral Psychology principles and methods to answer questions of employee sentiment within the broader organizational system. A component of this systemic change process includes our engagement assessment: As of Winter 2023, the primary eg “off-the-shelf” product is an engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. The eg team is also working on an package to capture online survey responses.
